import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Message from "./message" import { ChatContext } from '../context/ChatContext' import { onSnapshot } from 'firebase/firestore' const messages = () => { const {data}= useContext(ChatContext) const [messages,setMessages]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ const unSub=onSnapshot }) return (
) } export default messages
